result.arabic_text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
result.translation: 42. Toysa usun Sinni baatilit giirisoonay ken ixxic, kaadu sinni addunyal digritoonay ken ixxic ken ayróy (woh Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) kah xagnisimeenit ongoorowwu iyyaanam fanah.
